name: CodingGapRequest
title: Coding Gap Request CodeSystem
description: Type of risk adjustment coding gap request

concept.definition: Provider or certified coder to request to close the risk adjustment coding gap.

concept.display: Coding gap invalidated, patient never had the condition
concept.definition: Provider or certified coder to request an invalidation of the coding gap that was inaccurate because the patient has never had this condition.

concept.display: Coding gap invalidated, condition no longer active
concept.definition: Provider or certified coder to request an invalidation of the coding gap because the patient was correctly diagnosed but the condition is no longer active.
Provider or certified coder to request an invalidation of the coding gap because the patient has an active condition but the gap does not accurately describe it.
Provider or certified coder to create and request to close a net-new risk adjustment coding gap discovered during medical review.
